p.sub: Answering these questions while actively reading the text is good practice for answering the kinds of questions that might appear on the exams. Your answers may also shape the discussions in class.

open_response.prompt: Question: In the illustration below, which side of the beaker initially had the higher concentration of solute molecules separated by the vertical membrane? How are the concentrations of solute on either side of the membrane related once the beaker has established its equilibrium?
